Package com.view

Class SettingsView

java.lang.Object
com.view.SettingsView
public class SettingsView
extends java.lang.Object
View for Settings FXML Sets scene when either imagePicker or colourPicker is requested
Author:
Zain Rashid

    • createButtons

      public javafx.scene.layout.HBox createButtons​(java.lang.String[] array, javafx.scene.text.Text text, int count)
      Forms imagePicker buttons with images and text based on what image has been selected
      Parameters:
      array - array for image names
      text - set text for what image is currently selected
      count - counter decides whether an image, colour or nothing has been selected
      Returns:
      HBox of buttons with images
